name: WordPress Integration for Konzilo
author: Fabian SÃ¶rqvist

sections.description:
This plugin integrates your WordPress site with Konzilo,
An easy tool for all who manage web and social media. It allows you to:

  • Create promotions for your blog posts in Social Media directly from
  • WordPress Notify Konzilo about changes that are happening to your
    blog, so that the overview in Konzilo is kept up to date.

Support

If you’re having problems with the plugin, contact the Konzilo support at:

support@konzilo.com
sections.installation:
• Create an account in Konzilo, if you haven’t already.
  • Make sure you add your site to Konzilo by going to the accounts page and add it there.
  • Install the plugin
  • Create a new post or edit an existing post. If
    you set up your site in Konzilo, you should be good to go!
